column4: someone help me please I've been in computer hell for a week!
I installed ubuntu and it took over my entire 2tb drive
windows will not format it back to ntfs
Why not?
And how did ubuntu take over the "entire 2td drive"?
You can just use fdisk to remove the partitions
Which one is it? /dev/sdb  ?
What kind of drive is it?
What kind of drive is it? And which one is it?  /dev/sd?
We don't support windows installations here.
Like I said, if you just delete all partitons, windows will format the drive as it sees fit.  sudo fdisk /dev/sd?
But it shouldn't matter really, windows SHOULD see the drive, no matter what the filesystem.  You must have some sort of hardware configuration problem.
Again:  What kind of drive is it? And which one is it?  /dev/sd?
sudo fdisk -l   | pastebinit
What is wrong with VNC?
What VNC server and client did you use?  And was it from linux to ms or ms to linux?
How fast is your network?
I asked what client and server software you used..... ??????
If it worked perfectly, what is your question / problem?
So you have a hardware problem with your HD.
